summary.para: The get_IFormatResolution method retrieves the encoding resolution.

param.name: VideoFormat
param.para: Pointer to a variable that receives a member of the enumeration, specifying the video standard in use (NTSC or PAL).

param.name: DVFormat
param.para: Pointer to a variable that receives a member of the enumeration, specifying the digital video (DV) format.

param.name: Resolution
param.para: Pointer to a variable that receives a member of the enumeration, specifying the video resolution.

param.name: fDVInfo
param.para: Boolean value specifying whether to retrieve the structure that specifies the stream format. If TRUE, the stream format is returned in the sDVInfo parameter.

param.name: sDVInfo
param.para: Pointer to a variable that receives a DVINFO structure containing the stream format. If fDVInfo is FALSE, this parameter is ignored.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful. Otherwise, returns E_FAIL or another error code.

summary.para: The put_IFormatResolution method sets the encoding resolution.

param.name: VideoFormat
param.para: Member of the enumeration, specifying the video standard to use (NTSC or PAL).

param.name: DVFormat
param.para: Member of the enumeration, specifying the DV format.

param.name: Resolution
param.para: Member of the enumeration, specifying the video resolution.

param.name: fDVInfo
param.para: Boolean value specifying whether the sDVInfo parameter contains a valid structure. To set the stream format, set this parameter to TRUE and specify the format chunk with the sDVInfo parameter.

param.name: sDVInfo
param.para: If fDVInfo is TRUE, must point to a DVINFO structure that describes the stream format.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful. Otherwise, returns E_FAIL or another error code.

summary.para: The IDVEnc interface sets and retrieves properties on the DV Video Encoder filter.
